superHeroes.name: Cheetara
superHeroes.catchPhrase: I am Cheetara. In my heart, I know I'm the strongest of my kind. The pride of my people. I am unique in this universe. And I will *not be DEFEATED*!

superHeroes.name: Skeletor
superHeroes.catchPhrase: Listen, I am not nice, I am not kind and I am NOT WONDERFUL!

superHeroes.name: Maya
superHeroes.catchPhrase: It certainly is a great day to be alive.

superHeroes.name: TinTin
superHeroes.catchPhrase: They're trying to stop us with that ramshackle erection!

superHeroes.name: Zummi
superHeroes.catchPhrase: As you all know, the Great Book of Gummi will never be finished.
